articles.content:
Visits
   Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation of officials of the Workers' Party of Korea led by Rim Hyong Mo, secretary of its South Phyongan Provincial Committee, and a friendly visiting group of the Korean People's Army led by Colonel General Ri Yong Hwan left here for China on Tuesday.
 A Chinese delegation of the Antaishenglong Co., Ltd led by its President Zhang Hui arrived here on the same day.
